casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Robert Daren HALE, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157891
COA: 335396 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to add new grounds is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the April 10, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motion for an evidentiary hearing is DENIED.
